msbt.message: Who do we have here? You a visitor? Well, you just make yourself right at home, .

That there's a face I don't recognize. Pleased to make your acquaintance!Gotta say, I don't know what to make of all this dream stuff. It's all more than a bit strange.But meetin' a friendly face like yours in a dream is plenty enough to make it a good one, !
Hello there! I don't think we've met. You new around here? Or maybe it's possible I am Who knows?Honestly, it doesn't matter. I'm pleased to meet you all the same, ! Gahaha!

How ya been, ?Wow! I gotta say, seeing you is about as refreshin' as a midday nap. Which reminds me This IS a dream, right?You know what? It really doesn't matter. It's a treat to see you either way, !
! Hey, kiddo!Y'know, the other day I actually had a dream that we'd run into each other like this, .So I guess this is what you might call a dream come true, huh? Gahaha!
Hey there, !Sure didn't expect to run into you here. Not in my wildest dreams, ! Great to see you!

Good to see you, !Hey, is it just me, or is everything a little strange around here? I can't pin it down, but something's off.I'm gonna keep looking around. Whatever's going on, it sure is interestin', !
Well! ! Hey!Maybe you can help me answer something. Which of us is the one dreamin'? I can't figure it out.On second thought, it really doesn't matter. I'm happy to see a friendly face either way, .
Well, hello, !Wow! This dream-island business is interestin'! I can't help but wonder what else is out there, !
Talkin' to folks in a dream is just too strange. I mean Is this me talkin' to you, or you talkin' to yourself?
Runnin' into you like this makes me wonder if we've got some kind of special connection, .Don't forget about me when you wake up, kiddo. And maybe drop me a line sometime.
I must say, dream me sure is one handsome !Oh! You heard that? Guess my inner voice turns a bitouter in a dream. Whoops, !
Time's kinda different in dreams, so when I say you can hang out as long as you like, I mean it, !
Sure are a lot of dream islands out there. Some are really different too, ! So much possibility!
Visitin' someone else's dream island sure is a treat. There ain't a single nightmare to be found, !
